channel.title: Message-Queue on Liem Ly
channel.description: Recent content in Message-Queue on Liem Ly

item.title: Initial experience with Kafka
item.description: Before starting my job at Parcel Perform, the usage of Kafka, or message queue in general, would sound ridiculous to me. I just thought to myself: “why do we have to add complexity to our system, instead of processing the data, we have to put it into a place, and then consume from that”. However, after months of using that, I have started to realize how (mostly) wrong I am.
